Let’s send an Email with Tapis Actors¶

In this section, we will learn about building a custom actor that sends an email from scratch

Objectives for this session

  • To build an Actor that sends an email

Sections:

  • Create a Custom Actor
  • Send Email Message From Actor
  • Submit a Message to the Actor
  • Check the Logs for an Execution
